tasks.label: Setup Environment and Install Dependencies
tasks.command: python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install --force-reinstall --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

windows.command: python3 -m venv .venv; Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope Process; .venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; pip install -r requirements.txt
